article_title: Orthodontist Ben Burris Braces for Fight With Dental Board
article_text: A Fort Smith orthodontist is preparing to battle the Arkansas Board of Dental Examiners over allegations that offering dental cleanings might be a violation of a law against practicing outside his specialty.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news
